MarkAllReadHint: Mark all messages on this page as 'read'.
MarkAllReadConfirm: Are you sure? Click here to confirm.

loader.LoadingError: We're sorry! Patchwork experienced an error while loading.

error.fetchUsers: An error occurred while fetching users
error.loadingSync: This happened while loading the sync page
error.markNewReplyRead: Failed to mark live-streamed reply as read
error.nameDupPublish: Error While Publishing: You follow multiple people with the name "%{name}." Resolve this before publishing.

pubs.connect: Pubs connect you with global peers.
pubs.joinOne: You should join one! (Until you do, you can only talk to people over WiFi.)
pubs.joinMore: Joining more will increase your reach.

FriendsInfo: Users you follow, and who follow you back.
FollowingInfo: Users you follow, but who don't follow you back. They may not see messages from you.
FriendsOfFriendsInfo: Potential contacts from your social network.
NoDigs: Nobody has dug any of your posts yet. They will, though!
WatchChannelHint: Receive updates to this channel in your inbox.
UnwatchChannelHint: Stop receiving updates to this channel in your inbox.
NoPeers: There are currently no peers on your local network
PublicPeersInfo: Public Peers are just users with static addresses, which means they are easy to find. They're commonly servers which have been set up to share data.
IsFollowingYouInfo: Is following you - they will replicate your data.
IsNotFollowingYouInfo: Is not following you, but you might share data about mutual aquantances.
NoticesHint: Digs on your posts and new followers

warning.spam: Warning! This account is a spammer.
warning.dead: Warning! This account has been discontinued.

PubInfo: This user is a public bot. It shares user data with peers across the globe.
usersYouFollow: %{smart_count} users you follow |||| %{smart_count} user you follow
usersYouDontFollow: %{smart_count} users you don't follow |||| %{smart_count} user you don't follow

unsafeConfigAbort: Aborted due to unsafe config. Run again with --unsafe to override.

composer.PublishedPrivate: Your private message has been sent
composer.NotFollowedWarning: Warning: %{name} does not follow you, and may not receive your message.

channelList.ChannelsInfo: Channels are topical filters for conversations.

thread.WatchingHint: Updates will go in your Inbox. Click again to stop watching.
thread.WatchHint: Add this thread to your Inbox.
thread.CloseThread: Close this thread and leave it unread

msg.RemoveBookmark: Remove this message from your bookmarks
msg.AddBookmark: Add this message to your bookmarks
msg.MissingPostInfo: This post has not been downloaded. It may be authored by somebody outside of your network. Some of the other messages in this thread may reference it.

flag.FlagMsgInfo: Flagging hides unwanted/negative content. What's your reason for flagging this message?

invite.Contacting: Contacting server with invite code, this may take a few moments...
invite.JoinPubInfo: Pubs host your messages online, and connect you globally.
invite.CanSkip2: , but your messages won't reach outside the WiFi until you do it.

q.WhereCan: Where can I get an invite code?

a.WhatIs: An invite code tells the Pub to join your contacts.
a.WhereCan: You should ask a Pub operator. Many of them hang out in #scuttlebutt on Freenode.
a.CanCreate1: Yes, but it requires a public server. If you have one, you can

error.notAccepted: The invite code was not accepted.
error.expired: The invite code is mis-issued or expired.
error.somethingWrong: Something is wrong with the invite code.
error.failedConnect: Failed to connect to the pub server.
error.notFound: The pub server could not be found.
error.alreadyFollowed: You are already followed by this pub server.

help.codeRequired: The invite code was not accepted. It may have been used already. Ask the pub-operator for a new code and try again.
help.notAccepted: The invite code is incorrect or expired. Make sure you copy/pasted it correctly. If you did, ask the pub-operator for a new code and try again.
help.expired: The invite code is mis-issued or expired.
help.somethingWrong: The invite code is malformed. Make sure you copy/pasted it correctly. If you did, ask the pub-server owner for a new code and try again.
help.connectionFailure: The pub server did not identify itself correctly for the invite code. Ask the pub-operator for a new code and try again.
help.failedConnect: Failed to connect to the pub server. Check your connection, make sure the pub server is online, and try again.
help.notFound: Check your connection, make sure the pub server is online, and try again. If this issue persists, check with the pub operator.

chooseProfilePicturePrompt: Would you like to choose a picture?

name.RenameHelp: You can rename anybody. It will only change for you, but other people will see the name you chose.
name.BadNameChars: We're sorry, names can only include A-z 0-9 . _ - and cannot have spaces.
name.BadPeriodEnd: We're sorry, names cannot end with a period.
name.whatToCall: What would you like %{them} to be called?
